UpdatingMsvcGen

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Once in a while, when CS and cel change their build system. It is necessary to update the build system of Peragro too.

  1. Checkout CS 
    svn co https://crystal.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/crystal/CS/trunk CS
  2. Checkout the Peragro trunk in the same directory which contains CS and name it "peragro_svn". 
    svn co https://cyanox.nl/peragro/trunk peragro_svn --ignore-externals
  3. run CS/scripts/jamtemplate/createproject.sh
    • Short Name: peragro
    • Long Name: Peragro Tempus - Beyond Time
    • Version: 0.1
    • Homepage URL: http://peragro.org
    • Author: Peragro Team
    • Email: mark@peragro.org
    • Copyright: Peragro Team
    • GPL-compatible: yes
    • Utilize CEL: yes
  4. Copy all files in peragro/mk files to peragro_svn/mk 
    cp -R peragro/mk/* peragro_svn/mk
  5. Test it!
    • jam maintainerclean
    • ./autogen.sh
    • ./configure --without-cs --without-cel --without-CEGUI --without-boost
    • jam msvcgen
    • cp -r out/msvc/* msvc
    • Check the generated files for sanity (use common sense and your brain, or test it with msvc). svn status and svn diff helps.
      • Make sure _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE still exists!
  6. If everything is fine, add new files in mk and commit it. 
svn add $(svn status | sed -n -e "s/^?[ \t]*mk\//mk\//p")
svn commit
